summary: Satori is an elegant and clean color scheme for Vim
name: Satori-Color-Scheme
description:
Satori is an elegant and clean color scheme for white or black background terminals. This color scheme has been developed under Terminall.app on  Mac OS X but it also looks great in another Unix variants. 

Development version in http://code.google.com/p/ruda/source/browse/trunk/vim/satori.vim
install_details:
Download satori.vim 
$ mkdir -p .vim/colors/ 
$ mv satori.vim .vim/colors/ 
Edit .vimrc and insert "colorscheme satori"

versions.release_notes:
Using color green for searches
Fine tuned Error and Todo
Updated my email

- No longer coloring Functions group.
- Updated author's email.
- Other Cosmetics.

- Numbers are now colored like strings (red)
- Special symbols like \n is now colored magenta for a better contrast to strings
- Preprocessor macros is now colored  blue
